headline.main: HONG KONG BOMBED BY 'PEA SHOOTERS'; American P-40's, Rigged Up to Carry Explosives, Blast Ships in the Harbor

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China. Nov. 2 (U.P.) -- United States Army bomber-fighters have raided Hong Kong harbor again, setting one Japanese freighter afire and scoring near misses on two other ships, and Chinese pilots, striking out on their own in American-made bombers, have struck a heavy blow at the Yangtze River port of Hankow, it was revealed tonight.
